snippet.title: Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the world, some characters you'll meet, and gameplay from Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon in this new trailer for the upcoming open-world first-person RPG. Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and GOG) in Q2 2025. A demo is out now. Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon's final patch 0.9 is out now on Steam Early Access.

Song credits: Dziva - Ascension

#IGN #Gaming
